0.title: Can a complex technology make our life simpler?
0.text: This is a blockchain-based wallet to access Bloomen decentralized applications (Dapps)

1.title: Discovery & Enrollment
1.text: Search for Bloomen Dapps and aggregate them easily with a simple, anonymous sign in

2.title: Get some Tokens
2.text: Buy utility crypto-tokens for every Dapp to access their products and services

3.title: Purchase process
3.text: Initiate payments with a simple QR scan

4.title: Access Authorization
4.text: Allow any of your devices to access the purchased content or service

5.title: P2P exchange
5.text: Use your wallet to transfer your tokens with other peers

login.message: Please indicate if you want to create a new account, or if you already have an account and you prefer restore it.

home.data: Put the date into the input field

remove_device.title: Are you sure?
remove_device.text: You will no longer have access to your data from that device

scanQR.increase_balance: To increase your balance, scan the QR code of the card.

remove_dapp.title: Are you sure?
remove_dapp.description: This will remove your dapp and clean your mnemonic

clean_data.title: Are you sure?
clean_data.description: You will clean the mnemonic for this dapp

network_status.title: Internet connection not available
network_status.message: Please connect your device to the internet to use the app.

change_alias.title: Hey!
change_alias.message: Do you want to rename this alias?

add_recent_user.title: Hey!
add_recent_user.message: Do you want to save this new address with an alias?
